amendment.description: To provide the Committee on Finance of the Senate with additional options to reform and improve medicaid without the need to resort to block grant allotments with predetermined growth rates, which fail to adjust for economic recessions, demographic changes, or disasters.

vote.text: Amendment SA 309 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 309 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S4259-4260; text: CR S4260) To provide the Committee on Finance of the Senate with additional options to reform and improve medicaid without the need to resort to block grant allotments with predetermined growth rates, which fail to adjust for economic recessions, demographic changes, or disasters.
